projectsData.title: Spletna trgovina
projectsData.description: Popolnoma funkcionalna in odzivna spletna trgovina. Z nadzorno ploščo za kupce in administratorje kjer se lahko upravlja  naročila, zaloga, uporabniki,... Ima nakupovalni voziček z integriranim Paypal Api za spletno plačevanje. Kupci lahko iščejo in filtrirajo izdelke, jih dodajajo v košarico in opravijo spletno plačilo. Administratorji lahko urejajo in kreirajo  nove izdelke, pregledujejo preteklo prodajo in nadzirajo uporabnike. Če želite spletno mesto preizkusiti kot administrator se prijavite s temi podatki: e-pošta: admin@admin.com, geslo: '123456'

technologies.name: ReactJS
technologies.description: Komponente za večkratno uporabo, kontekstni API, kljuke in drugo

technologies.name: NextJS
technologies.description: Nastavitev projekta, navigacija med stranmi in pridobivanje podatkov, dinamično usmerjanje, optimizacija slik, SSG in SSR

technologies.name: MongoDB / Mongoose
technologies.description: Shranjevanje in pridobivanje podatkov, kot so izdelki, naročila in uporabniki

technologies.name: Next Connect
technologies.description: Backend API

technologies.name: PayPal developer api
technologies.description: Za spletna plačila

technologies.name: Material UI
technologies.description: Za izdelavo odzivnega spletnega mesta z uporabo teme po meri, animacij, vrtiljaka in več

technologies.name: Deployment
technologies.description: Gostovanje Vercel z neprekinjenim nalaganjem preko Github

features.name: User Registration and Authentication
features.description: Uporabniki se lahko registrirajo za hitrejši nakup v prihodnje. Strani so zaščitene, tako da imajo dostop samo overjeni uporabniki

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Uporabniki lahko dodajajo izdelke v košarico, posodabljajo količino ali odstranijo artikle ter opravljajo spletno plačilo s Paypalom in kreditno kartico

features.name: User
features.description: Uporabniki lahko obiščejo stran z zgodovino naročil, da preverijo pretekle nakupe. Lahko ocenijo in komentirajo izdelke. Na profilni strani lahko spremenijo svoje uporabniško ime, e-pošto in geslo

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Administratorji si lahko ogledajo podrobnosti preteklih nakupov, preverijo in spremenijo status dostave in plačila. Lahko dodajajo nove izdelke ali posodabijo obstoječe. Lahko tudi upravljajo, brišejo uporabnike ter ustvarijo nove skrbnike.

features.name: SEO
features.description: Dinamične meta oznake, ki temeljijo na dinamičnih straneh in vsebini

todos.name: Ponastavitev gesla
todos.description: Potrebno je implementirati možnost ponastavitve pozabljenega gesla

todos.name: E-poštna obvestila
todos.description: Uporabniki bodo ob registraciji, ponastavitvi gesla ali opravljenem nakupu prejeli e-pošto s določenimi informacijami

todos.name: PDF Receipt
todos.description: Po opravljenem nakupu bo uporabnik prejel PDF račun in bo na voljo v nadzorni plošči v zgodovini naročil

projectsData.title: Music Events
projectsData.description: Fullstack events website. For backend is used Strapi CMS. Users are able to register and post events.

technologies.name: ReactJS
technologies.description: Reusable components, hooks and more

technologies.name: NextJS
technologies.description: Setting up project, navigating between pages and data fetching,  dynamic routing, image optimization, pagination

technologies.name: Strapi CMS
technologies.description: Open source headless CMS and fully customizable. Used for admin to manage users and events

technologies.name: Security
technologies.description: JWT (JSON Web Tokens), storing HttpOnly Cookies on the server, authorization and access control

technologies.name: Cloudinary
technologies.description: Image uploading with Cloudinary integration

technologies.name: Deployment
technologies.description: Frontend hosted on Vercel and backend on Heroku with continuous deployment from Github

features.name: User Registration and Authorization
features.description: Users can register to post events. Pages are protected so only authenticated users have access to own content

features.name: User
features.description: Users can visit dashboard page to check, edit or delete posted events

features.name: Map
features.description: Automatic map generation with marked location of event that is visible on website

features.name: SEO
features.description: Dynamic meta tags based on dynamic pages and content

todos.name: Comment and rate events
todos.description: Need to implement ability to comment and rate events by users

todos.name: Reset Password
todos.description: Need to implement ability to reset forgotten password

todos.name: Email notifications
todos.description: Users will recieve email with specific information when they register, reset password

todos.name: Chat Room
todos.description: Where visitors can talk and comment about events

projectsData.title: Weather App
projectsData.description: Weather App that shows hourly and daily forecast based on device's geolocation. Background is animated and changes based on weather condition

technologies.name: Openweather API
technologies.description: For fetching weather information with api calls

technologies.name: Javascript
technologies.description: For interactivity and DOM manipulation

technologies.name: Styling
technologies.description: For styling is used Material Design for Bootstrap

technologies.name: Deployment
technologies.description: Hosted on Netlify with continuous deployment from Github

features.name: Weather Information
features.description: You can check weather forecast for your device's current loaction. There is hourly and daily forecast.

todos.name: Search
todos.description: Search bar for looking up other locations

todos.name: Local storage
todos.description: Save favorite locations to local storage and always display theirs weather information
